name: ApplicationInsightsTask
description: Create an instance of Application Insights
author: InCycleSoftwareInc-DEV

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Resource Manager Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager Subscription to target deplpoyment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Azure Resource Group for deployment.

inputs.name: instanceName
inputs.label: Application Insights Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Application Insights instance to create.

inputs.name: applicationType
inputs.label: Application Insights Application Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the default configuration for the App Insights instance.

inputs.name: priceCode
inputs.label: Pricing Plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the pricing plan for the App Insights instance.

OutputVariables.name: InstrumentationKey
OutputVariables.description: Holds the name output for the task. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the App Insights key in subsequent tasks.
